00012 #include "types/function_type.h"

00014 namespace reflection

00019         struct construct_attribute::construct_impl : public attribute::attribute_impl
00020         {
00021                 construct_impl(function_type* ctorType, void* ctorDeleg, TDtor d)
00022                         : attribute_impl(ATTR_CONSTRUCTION)
00023                         , m_ctorType(ctorType)
00024                         , m_dtor(d)
00025                 {
00026                         memcpy(m_delegBuf, ctorDeleg, sizeof(m_delegBuf));
00027                 }
00028 
00029                 char m_delegBuf[member::_deleg_buf_size];
00030                 function_type* m_ctorType;
00031                 TDtor m_dtor;
00032         };
00033 
00035 
00036         construct_attribute::construct_attribute(function_type *ctorType, void *ctorDeleg, TDtor d)
00037                 : attribute(new construct_impl(ctorType, ctorDeleg, d))
00038         {
00039                 m_impl = static_cast<construct_impl*>(attribute::m_impl);
00040         }
00041 
00043 
00044         construct_attribute::construct_attribute(construct_impl *impl)
00045                 : attribute(impl)
00046                 , m_impl(impl)
00047         {
00048         }
00049 
00051 
00052         void* construct_attribute::create_instance(void** args) const
00053         {
00054                 void* ret = 0;
00055                 m_impl->m_ctorType->invoke((void*)m_impl->m_delegBuf, args, &ret);
00056                 return ret;
00057         }
00058 
00060 
00061         void construct_attribute::destroy_instance(void* v) const
00062         {
00063                 m_impl->m_dtor(v);
00064         }
00065 
00067 
00068         const function_type& construct_attribute::ctor_type() const
00069         {
00070                 return *m_impl->m_ctorType;
00071         }       
00072 
00074 
00075         construct_attribute* construct_attribute::clone() const
00076         {
00077                 return new construct_attribute(new construct_impl(*m_impl));
00078         }
00079 
00081 
00082         void construct_attribute::release()
00083         {
00084                 delete this;
00085         }
